languages.text: "Трудолюбивые служители и насельники сей обители, электрожрецы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Братство Корпускариев оказало нам великую честь, вверив нашей заботе святую реликвию, вокруг которой возведена Благословенная Электродинамическая обитель".

traits.locale_text: "Трудолюбивые служители и насельники сей обители, электрожрецы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Братство Корпускариев оказало нам великую честь, вверив нашей заботе святую реликвию, вокруг которой возведена Благословенная Электродинамическая обитель".

languages.text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."
languages.original_text: "Трудолюбивые служители и насельники сей обители, электрожрецы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Братство Корпускариев оказало нам великую честь, вверив нашей заботе святую реликвию, вокруг которой возведена Благословенная Электродинамическая обитель".

traits.locale_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium had been built."

"The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium had been built."

"The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium had been built."

"The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium had been built."

"The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

"The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

languages.text: "Die fleißigen Diener und Bewohner dieses Cenobiums. Elektropriester des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Die Corpuscarii haben uns eine große Ehre erwiesen, indem sie das heilige Relikt in unsere Obhut gegeben haben, um das herum das Heilige Elektrodynamische Cenobium errichtet wurde."
languages.original_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

traits.locale_text: "Die fleißigen Diener und Bewohner dieses Cenobiums. Elektropriester des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Die Corpuscarii haben uns eine große Ehre erwiesen, indem sie das heilige Relikt in unsere Obhut gegeben haben, um das herum das Heilige Elektrodynamische Cenobium errichtet wurde."

languages.text: « Nous sommes les serviteurs dévoués qui habitent ce Cenobium. Nous sommes les électro-prêtres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Les Corpuscarii nous ont fait l'honneur de nous confier la garde de la relique sacrée autour de laquelle le Cenobium électrodynamique sacré a été bâti. »
languages.original_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes les serviteurs dévoués qui habitent ce Cenobium. Nous sommes les électroprêtres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Les Corpuscarii nous ont fait l'honneur de nous confier la garde de la relique sacrée autour de laquelle le Cenobium électrodynamique sacré a été bâti. »

languages.text: “我们是这所修道院辛勤的仆人与居民，是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的电僧。科普斯卡里将神圣的遗物托付给我们，这是我们莫大的荣幸。整个神圣电驱修会都是围绕着那件圣物建造的。”
languages.original_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

traits.locale_text: “我们是这所修道院辛勤的仆人与居民，是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的驭电祭司。科普斯卡里将神圣的遗物托付给我们，这是我们莫大的荣幸。整个神圣电驱力修会都是围绕着那件圣物建造的。”

languages.text: 「この連生体の勤勉な住民にしてしもべ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のエレクトロ・プリースト。コープスカリィは、我々に神聖なる電力連生体に囲まれた遺物を託してくれたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

traits.locale_text: 「この連生体の勤勉な住民にしてしもべ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のエレクトロ・プリースト。コープスカリィは、我々に聖なる電力連生体に囲まれた遺物を託してくれたのだ」

languages.text: «Los trabajadores servidores y moradores de este cenobio. Electrosacerdotes del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Los Corpuscarii nos honraron al confiarnos la reliquia sagrada en torno a la cual se construyó el Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado».
languages.original_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

traits.locale_text: «Los trabajadores servidores y moradores de este cenobio. Electrosacerdotes del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Los Corpuscarii nos honraron al confiarnos la reliquia sagrada en torno a la cual se construyó el Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado».

languages.text: "Bu senobiyumun canla başla çalışan hizmetkârları ve sakinleri, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'un{/g} Elektro Rahipleriyiz. Tümbedenciler, Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'nun etrafına inşa edildiği kutsal yadigârı himayemize vererek bize büyük bir şeref bahşettiler."
languages.original_text: "The hard-working servants and dwellers of this cenobium. Electro-Priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The Corpuscarii did us a great honour by entrusting into our care the sacred relic around which the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium was built."

traits.locale_text: "Bu senobiyumun canla başla çalışan hizmetkârları ve sakinleri, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'un Elektro Rahipleriyiz. Tümbedenciler, Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'nun etrafına inşa edildiği kutsal yadigârı himayemize vererek bizi onurlandırdılar."
